name: Red Riding Hood (itch) (anuratisrivastva)
description:
Game Controls: Arrow Keys ⬅️ ➡️  and Spacebar to Jump. Move forward to push the standing wolves. Avoid the moving wolves.

You're Red Riding Hood and you must:
1) Believe in yourself  (love notes to help you!)

2) Avoid touching the moving wolves!

3) Push the speaking wolves and drown out their nonsensical tirade, literally

4) Reach Grandma and chill with her :) 

My first "proper" game through Code Coven's IGM Cohort.
